official-title.#text: To amend the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000 to exempt payments made to States and counties under such Act from any reduction pursuant to a sequestration order and to reimburse those States and counties that returned a portion of their January 2013 payment because of sequestration, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committees on
, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

header.#text: Exemption of payments to States and counties under the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000 from sequestration orders

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 403 of the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000/s:403

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: or derived from the other funding sources authorized by
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000/s:402

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: for the purpose of making the payments to States and counties required by
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000/s:102/ss:b/p:3
Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000/s:102

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, any Presidential sequestration order issued after the date of the enactment of this subsection under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall provide that no reduction is made with respect to funds made available under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: part C of title II of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/t:II/pt:C

header.#text: Reimbursement of previously sequestered payments or forgiveness of repayment requirement

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall reimburse each State or county that, in response to a Presidential sequestration order issued during fiscal year 2013, repaid some of the payment received by the State or county during such fiscal year under such

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000/s:102

text.#text: Using the payment sources authorized by

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: subsection (b)(3) of section 102 of the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000/s:102/ss:b/p:3

text.#text: returning to the Secretary a portion of the payment;
having funds deducted from other amounts due the State or county under such Act; or
providing some combination of returning and deducting funds.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall be equal to the amount repaid by the State or county as provided in such paragraph.

text.#text: The amount to be reimbursed to a State or county under
In the case of any State or county that did not repay, before the date of the enactment of this Act, the required portion of the payment received by the State or county during fiscal year 2013 under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: despite the Presidential sequestration order, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 102 of the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000/s:102

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3886 IH: To amend the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000 to exempt payments made to States and counties under such Act from any reduction pursuant to a sequestration order and to reimburse those States and counties that returned a portion of their January 2013 payment because of sequestration, and for other purposes.
